title: Australian diary. No. 135
brief_description: Magazine items: Coleambally irrigation area, N.S.W.: Water has brought good production and harvests to farms which were once barren wildernesses; Albert Park: Five hundred and seventy acres of Melbourne parkland are put to good use; a large lake, parklands, sporting areas, buildings and a restaurant. No other credits available.
